mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, createdDate, startDate, endDate, startTime, endTime, priorityName FROM schedules ORDER BY createdDate ASC, startDate ASC;
SELECT id, title, description, createdDate, startDate, endDate, startTime, endTime, priorityName FROM schedules WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY createdDate ASC, startDate ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules ( title, description, createdDate, startDate, endDate, startTime, endTime, priorityName ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, CURRENT_DATE, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{priorityName} );
mapper.update: UPDATE schedules SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, startTime = #{startTime}, endTime = #{endTime}, priorityName = #{priorityName} WHERE id = #{id};
